name: Classic Burger
recipe: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and pickles, served on a sesame seed bun.

recipe: Grilled chicken patty seasoned with Mediterranean herbs and spices, topped with feta cheese, tzatziki sauce, lettuce, and tomato, served on a ciabatta bun.

recipe: Plant-based patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and vegan mayo, served on a whole wheat bun.

recipe: Beef patty smothered in barbecue sauce, topped with crispy onion straws, ranch dressing, and lettuce.

recipe: Grilled chicken breast with spicy mayo, jalapenos, lettuce, and pepper jack cheese.
